name: Shadow Chaser
description:
Shadow Chaser

Run and jump your way to the yellow door.

Controls

A and D or Arrow keys to move left and right

Space bar is jump. You can double jump and wall jump.

Death

Falling off the bottom of the screen is death.

On each Stage there are three levels. When you've completed Level 1, your path of completion will be applied to the ghost in Level 2. Level 3 brings in ghosts for both your paths in Level 1 and Level 2. Touching those ghosts means death.

Good Luck and Thanks for Playing!
